name: clacked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
clack
If two hard objects clack, they make a short sharp noise because they hit together: Their heels clacked on the bare concrete. A typewriter was clacking in the next room.
More examplesFewer examplesShe heard his footsteps clacking along the concrete pavement.My teeth clacked together from the impact. The knocker on her door clacked noisily as she slammed it closed.
